title: JabFox
name: jabfox
description: JabFox collects online research material and sends the bibliographic information in one click to JabRef.
author: Tobias Diez <TobiasDiez@gmx.de>

preferences.name: jabRefPath
preferences.title: Path to JabRef
preferences.description: The path of the executable file of JabRef, i.e. the install location of 'JabRef.exe'.
